author: Staff Reporter
text:
Sambia Sohrab, the main accused in the hit-and-run case in which an Air Force official was killed, was arrested late on Saturday night. A court here on Sunday remanded him in police custody for 14 days.

Mr. Sambia, son of former Rashtriya Janata Dal MLA from West Bengal Mohd. Sohrab, who recently shifted loyalties to the Trinamool Congress (TMC), was arrested from Beckbagan in the south-eastern part of the city. The TMC leadership, however, denied any association with him.
title: Prime accused in hit-and-run case held
